title: Hyundai and Kia tease the wacky and wonderful future of vehicles
text:
Hyundai and Kia tease the wacky and wonderful future of vehicles 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Every year Hyundai and Kia hold their R&D Idea Festival. This is where engineers have the opportunity to create what they see as the future ...
